p: A single injection of between 4 and 20×10 6 MSCs suspended in 1 mL of Dulbecco's Modified Eagle Medium will be injected under ultrasound control by a delegated, experienced and trained radiologist along the length of the tendon at the area of greatest degeneration starting just distal to the degeneration and finishing just proximal to normal structure. Participants will be observed for a minimum of 2 hours after implantation for any immediate adverse effects.
